node.title: BitTorrent is Now a TRON Super Representative
node.content: As the pioneer of the most popular decentralized p2p communications protocol, BitTorrent is proud to have been elected as a Super Representative by the TRON community.  We acknowledge that a decentralized internet needs a foundation where DApp development can flourish on the TRON platform.  As a Super Representative elected by the TRON community, our role is important in building this foundation.  We thank the TRON community for voting for BitTorrent as one of the 27 SRs. By doing our part to help govern the TRON network and maintain the stability and reliability of the ongoing block generation, we help provide the backbone of the network to support thousands of 3rd party DApps and services and hundreds of millions of users.  Now we look to strengthen our infrastructure to service the TRON community for many years to come.  From the entire BitTorrent team, we again extend a big thank you!

navText.Your purchase of digital coins via credi: Your purchase of digital coins via credit card is facilitated by a third party service provider, Simplex Payment Services UAB.
navText.BitTorrent does not facilitate this tran: BitTorrent does not facilitate this transaction and expressly disclaims all warranties related to this third party service.
navText.The crypto amount quoted is based on the: The crypto amount quoted is based on the current rate and is not final.
navText.If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5%: If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5% you will be asked to reconfirm the transaction via email from Simplex.
navText.BTT is not available for direct purchase: BTT is not available for direct purchase from all geographic locations.
navText.If you have any questions, please contac: If you have any questions, please contact Simplex customer support at support@simplex.com.
